props.color: General color applied to icons and sliders.
props.trackColor: Passed to the main slider `color` prop.
props.playing: Applies correct icon of the default play button.
props.fullscreen: Applies correct icon on the default fullscreen button.
props.floating: Introduces visual spacing from the video boundaries.
props.splitTime: Splits time into elapsed and remaining on each side of the main slider.
props.pills: Makes the container transparent and shows inner actions in separated boxes.
props.detached: Moves the container below so it won't obstruct the video.
props.duration: Total duration of the video used to calculate displayed time.
props.volume: Volume value passed to the underlying control and slots.
props.volumeProps: Props passed down to the VVideoVolume component.
